TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kalotong, title = Kalotong, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalotong} }

S.FORM: == Kalotong == u sulit nu Hulam: 加里洞部落 i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kalotong. u kasalumaluma' nu Kalotong sa, 88 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 214 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 154 ku tademaw, pakalatu 72%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 60 ku tademaw, pakalatu 28%. u kasabinacadan, Amis 65%, zumazuma 7%. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin: u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan (Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah (Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah (Amis). u Pangcah cidekay a tademaw si207940, katukuh 2017-9. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Kalotong == o solit no Holam: 加里洞部落 i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kalotong. o kasalomaloma' no Kalotong sa, 88 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 214 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 154 ko tademaw, pakalato 72%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 60 ko tademaw, pakalato 28%. o kasabinacadan, Amis 65%, zomazoma 7%. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin: o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan (Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah (Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah (Amis). o Pangcah cidekay a tademaw si207940, katokoh 2017-9. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
